column4: Hi all, Is there a Text to speech synthesizer available for Linux better than festival?
Orca is the screen reader no?
i want to save the thing as ogg or wav
is desktop sharing etc available on skype?
but teamviewer has time issue. i think a free version session can only span to 5 or 10 minutes
is it free software or freeware??
no idea just read their docs
its full version is free to non commercial use. for commercial use they apply charges
